parameters.description: Maximum phytoplankton specific growth rate (per day). Controls peak primary production.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Maximum phytoplankton growth rate per day

parameters.description: Half-saturation constant for nutrient uptake in Monod limitation.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Half-saturation nutrient uptake constant (g C/m³)

parameters.description: Maximum zooplankton grazing rate (per day).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Maximum zooplankton grazing rate per day

parameters.description: Half-saturation scale for Holling III grazing response.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Half-saturation constant for grazing response (g C/m³)

parameters.description: Predator (zooplankton) interference coefficient in a Beddington-DeAngelis functional response; reduces per-capita grazing at high Z: G = g_max * (P^h/(K_G^h + P^h)) * Z / (1 + I_Z * Z).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Beddington-DeAngelis predator interference coefficient (per biomass of zooplankton)

parameters.description: Holling type III shape parameter (>=1); larger values strengthen the low-P refuge.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Holling type III grazing shape exponent

parameters.description: Zooplankton assimilation efficiency (fraction of ingestion converted to biomass).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Zooplankton assimilation efficiency fraction

parameters.description: Slope controlling nutrient-dependent variation in zooplankton assimilation efficiency on the logit scale: beta_eff = inv_logit(logit(beta) + beta_slope_fN * (f_N - 0.5)). Positive values increase efficiency when nutrients are abundant (higher f_N).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Nutrient-dependence of zooplankton assimilation efficiency (logit slope)

parameters.description: Phytoplankton linear mortality/exudation rate (per day).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Phytoplankton linear mortality rate per day

parameters.description: Quadratic zooplankton mortality coefficient (per day per biomass).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Quadratic zooplankton mortality coefficient (per day per biomass)

parameters.description: Fraction of unassimilated grazing and mortality immediately remineralized to dissolved nutrient (remaining fraction enters detrital pool D).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Immediate remineralization fraction of biomass losses to nutrients

parameters.description: First-order remineralization rate of detrital pool D back to dissolved nutrient N.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Remineralization rate of detritus to nutrients (per day)

parameters.description: Effective first-order sinking/export rate of detrital pool D out of the mixed layer.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Sinking/export rate of detritus from the mixed layer (per day)

parameters.description: Deep (source) nutrient concentration that mixing relaxes toward.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Deep ocean nutrient concentration (g C/m³)

parameters.description: First-order mixing/entrainment rate driving exchange with the deep nutrient pool.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Mixing rate between surface and deep nutrients per day

parameters.description: Logit-scale intercept controlling the mean of the seasonal environmental modifier.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Logit intercept of seasonal environmental modifier

parameters.description: Logit-scale amplitude of seasonal environmental modifier driven by a sinusoid.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Amplitude of seasonal environmental modifier on logit scale

parameters.description: Phase shift of the seasonal cycle (0–2π).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Phase shift of seasonal cycle in radians

parameters.description: Logarithm of observation standard deviation for N in a lognormal error model.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Log standard deviation of nutrient observation error

parameters.description: Logarithm of observation standard deviation for P in a lognormal error model.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Log standard deviation of phytoplankton observation error

parameters.description: Logarithm of observation standard deviation for Z in a lognormal error model.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Log standard deviation of zooplankton observation error

parameters.description: Period of the seasonal forcing used in the environmental modifier.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Period of seasonal forcing in days

parameters.description: Minimum SD used to stabilize the lognormal likelihood to avoid unrealistically small variances.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Minimum observation standard deviation for likelihood stability

parameters.description: Weight on quadratic penalties that discourage negative predicted states.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Weight for penalties on negative predicted states
